info.description: This is the TicketPulse API for ticketing microservice. Concerts, sessions, sections and tickets are all here.
info.title: TicketPulse Ticketing API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all concerts.
Retrieves details of a concert by its ID.

put.description: Updates a concert by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a concert by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves sessions of a concert by its ID.

post.description: Create a new section and its associated tickets

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific section by its ID

put.description: Update details of a specific section by its ID

delete.description: Delete a specific section by its ID

get.description: Retrieve all tickets associated with a specific section by its ID
Retrieves a list of all concert sessions.

post.description: Creates a new concert session with the provided details.

parameters.description: Date and time of the session
parameters.name: sessionDateTime

get.description: Retrieves a concert session by its ID.
get.summary: Get a Concert Session by ID

put.description: Updates the date and time of a concert session.

parameters.description: Date and time of the session
parameters.name: sessionDateTime

delete.description: Deletes a concert session and its children by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves sections associated with a concert session by its ID.
Retrieves a list of all tickets.
Retrieves a ticket by its ID.

put.description: Updates a ticket by its ID.

artist.description: Artist holds the value of the "artist" field.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the ConcertQuery when eager-loading is set.

imageUrl.description: ImageUrl holds the value of the "imageUrl" field.

title.description: Title holds the value of the "title" field.

hasConcertSessions.description: HasConcertSessions holds the value of the hasConcertSessions edge.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the ConcertSessionQuery when eager-loading is set.

sessionDateTime.description: SessionDateTime holds the value of the "sessionDateTime" field.

hasSections.description: HasSections holds the value of the hasSections edge.

ofConcert.description: OfConcert holds the value of the ofConcert edge.

bought.description: Bought holds the value of the "bought" field.

capacity.description: Capacity holds the value of the "capacity" field.

category.description: Category holds the value of the "category" field.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the SectionQuery when eager-loading is set.

name.description: Name holds the value of the "name" field.

price.description: Price holds the value of the "price" field.

reserved.description: Reserved holds the value of the "reserved" field.

atConcertSession.description: AtConcertSession holds the value of the atConcertSession edge.

hasTickets.description: HasTickets holds the value of the hasTickets edge.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the TicketQuery when eager-loading is set.

seatNumber.description: SeatNumber holds the value of the "seatNumber" field.

status.description: Status holds the value of the "status" field.

userId.description: UserId holds the value of the "userId" field.

withinSection.description: WithinSection holds the value of the withinSection edge.
